name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: ipc.client.connect.timeout
description:
Indicates the number of milliseconds a client will wait for the
               socket to establish a server connection.

name: hadoop.caller.context.max.size
description:
The maximum bytes a caller context string can have. If the
      passed caller context is longer than this maximum bytes, client will
      truncate it before sending to server. Note that the server may have a
      different maximum size, and will truncate the caller context to the
      maximum size it allows.

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.client.max-retries
description:
The number of client retries to the RM/HS before
    throwing exception. This is a layer above the ipc.

name: dfs.client.failover.max.attempts
description:
Expert only. The number of client failover attempts that should be
    made before the failover is considered failed.

name: dfs.datanode.network.counts.cache.max.size
description:
The maximum number of entries the datanode per-host network error
    count cache may contain.

name: dfs.namenode.fs-limits.max-directory-items
description:
Defines the maximum number of items that a directory may
      contain. Cannot set the property to a value less than 1 or more than
      6400000.

name: hadoop.security.kms.client.timeout
description:
Sets value for KMS client connection timeout, and the read timeout
    to KMS servers.

name: fs.ftp.host.port
description: FTP filesystem connects to fs.ftp.host on this port
